quote: Everything flows, and nothing abides, everything gives way, and nothing stays fixed.
author: Heraclitus

quote: What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others.
author: Pericles

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Know how to listen and you will profit even from those who talk badly.
author: Plutarch
